title: Chibi Maruko-chan
resume: Momoko Sakura is an elementary school student who likes popular  idol Momoe Yamaguchi and mangas. She is often called "Chibi Maruko-chan"  due to her young age and small size. She lives together with her  parents, her grandparents and her elder sister in a little town. In  school, she has many friends with whom she studies and plays together  everyday, including her close pal, Tama-chan; the student committee  members, Maruo-kun and Migiwa-san; and the B-class trio: 'little master'  Hanawa-kun, Hamaji-Bu Taro and Sekiguchi-kun.
